Name: Secret Pact
RuleHint: Guaranteed to receive a <color=#fa8f26><size=28>Core Layer</size></color> reward within <color=#fa8f26><size=28>10 attempts</size></color>
BaseRules: All rewards are limited, and cannot be obtained again after drawing; you will definitely obtain the character coating [Azure Apocalypse] once you complete [10X] research
Each research needs to cost a Secret Pact Card and the research cost increases as following: 50/100/250/400/600/800/1200/1700/2200/2700

When the Secret Pact Card for research is inadequate, you can use Black Card or Rainbow Card to exchange                                                     Black Card: Equivalent     Rainbow Card: Discount

The probability of obtaining various rewards for each research is different, and there is a probability of obtaining coating [Azure Apocalypse] from the starting of [5th] research; You can go to [Drop Details] to check the probability
When it comes to the [8th] research, you can obtain the extra reward of [Azure Apocalypse Portrait]

Name: Endless Summer Blue
RuleHint: Guaranteed to receive a <color=#fa8f26><size=28>Core Layer</size></color> reward within <color=#fa8f26><size=28>10 attempts</size></color>
BaseRules: All rewards are limited, and cannot be obtained again after drawing; you will definitely obtain the character coating [Dance of Ripplets] once you complete [10X] research
Each research needs to cost a [Mermaid's Gift] and the research cost increases as following: 50/100/250/400/600/800/1200/1700/2200/2700

When the [Mermaid's Gift] for research is inadequate, you can use Black Card or Rainbow Card to exchange                                                     Black Card: Equivalent     Rainbow Card: Discount

The probability of obtaining various rewards for each research is different, and there is a probability of obtaining the coating [Dance of Ripplets] starting at the [5th] research. You can go to [Drop Details] to check the probability.
When the [8th] research is reached, you will obtain the extra reward of [Dance of Ripplets Portrait]
